body:
Replaced by #15981 

This is my first example of creating a "smoke" test in C that needs to be compiled.  ~One of the existing tests for the library -- and required files -- were also explicitly copied.~

Compilation options were gleaned from those generated during the normal test build process for the library, which is not ideal from a portability standpoint.

TODO:

- [x] Change acquisition of `cc` executable to use `which`
- [x] Restructure test to prepare for a `_run_test` from #15092 
~- [ ] Determine suitable way to grab `sigsegv1` from build (if becker33 doesn't do it first)~
~- [ ] Replace local `_run_test` with package's version from commit bd58f41~
title: Preliminary libsigsegv smoke tests
